TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UseLicense extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表可讓您存取受保護版權管理內容的授權。

span.span: Represents a license that enables access to protected rights managed content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如同其他型別，才可用於完全信任應用程式。As with other types, is only usable in full trust applications. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個類別來初始化。The following example shows how to use this class to initialize a . MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationData As IDictionary(Of String, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ ApplicationData { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得應用程式資料字典，其中包含從發行應用程式傳遞至使用應用程式的金鑰/值組。

span.span: Gets the application data dictionary that contains key/value pairs passed from the publishing application to the consuming application.

value.span: 應用程式資料字典，其中包含從發行應用程式傳遞至使用應用程式的金鑰/值組。

span.span: The application data dictionary that contains key/value pairs passed from the publishing application to the consuming application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Rights Management Services (RMS) 伺服器來處理參數的一個資料索引鍵/值組，則字串組"Allow_Server_Editing"/"True"。One data key/value pair that is processed by a Rights Management Services (RMS) server is the string pair "Allow_Server_Editing"/"True". 當發行授權"Allow_Server_Editing"/"True"設定，該服務或任何受信任的服務，可以重複使用的內容金鑰。When the issuance license "Allow_Server_Editing"/"True" is set, the service, or any trusted service, can reuse the content key. 索引鍵/值組"設定 NOLICCACHE"/"1"會控制內嵌原則取用應用程式的使用授權。The key/value pair "NOLICCACHE" / "1" controls the Use License embedding policy of consuming applications. 當"設定 NOLICCACHE"/"1"設定時，應用程式預期不會內嵌在版權管理文件內的使用授權。When "NOLICCACHE" / "1" is set, applications are expected not to embed the Use License within the rights managed document.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider Bind(class System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment secureEnvironment) cil managed

span.span: The environment to bind the license to.
Binds the license to a given .

returns.span: 如果授權繫結成功，則為 執行個體，否則為 。

span.span: A instance if the license binding succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 授權繫結至安全的環境之後，可以檢查應用程式，並執行授權授與的權限。After the license is bound to a secure environment, the application can examine and exercise the rights granted by the license. 傳回執行個體會提供解密及存取受保護的權限管理內容。The returned instance provides decryption and access to the protected rights managed content. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個方法來初始化。The following example shows how to use this method to initialize a . [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubEncrypt](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubencrypt)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubEncrypt](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubencrypt)]

Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 傳回與此授權相關聯的雜湊碼。

span.span: Returns the hash code associated with this license.
A hash code for this license.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回雜湊程式碼以基礎上序列化[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xrml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xrml-md.md)]字串傳遞至建構函式。The returned hash code is based on the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xrml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xrml-md.md)] string passed to the constructor.

The owner of the license.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得授權擁有者從序列化[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xrml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xrml-md.md)]字串傳遞至建構函式。The license owner is obtained from the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xrml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xrml-md.md)] string passed to the constructor.
